page.title: 16Bee keeping, The Narth. .3.
page.content: When working with bees special clothing has to be worn; white overalls,long gloves and a brimmed hat with a black veil to stop the bees stinging you. A smoker is also used to stop the bees stinging as well. In the summer my father has to check inside the hive every two weeks to stop swarming.At the end of the summer the honey comb is full of honey and my father gets this out using a special machine called an extractor. The honey is then put into jars.The most common hives are W.B.C. and the National Hive and we have one of each.
